verbose_text: For example, glucosamine (the most widely used OA medication in postmenopausal women) is known to cause glucose intolerance and IR and inhibits insulin production by pancreatic beta-cells, resulting in apoptosis and deranged glucose metabolism [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: glucosamine (the most widely used OA medication in postmenopausal women) is known to cause glucose intolerance and IR and inhibits insulin
